projects.title: Property Site
projects.description: This is a property template site built using React, this can be adjusted to fit a clients needs

projects.title: Law Firm Site
projects.description: This app is a template for a Law Firm. It can be improved to include team members and book apppointments

projects.title: Team Profile Generator
projects.description: This is an app that uses npm inquirer to get information from user and generate a profile.

projects.title: ReadME File Generator
projects.description: This is an app that uses npm inquirer to get information from user and generate a ReadME file.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: This is a 5-day weather forecast app, user searches a particular location and is provided with forecast for location.

projects.title: Password Generator
projects.description: This is a random password generator that allows the user to select length of password as well as characters.

projects.title: Recipedia
projects.description: This is a group project that users can search a particular dish or ingredient to get recipes with an added restaurant list depending on user location.
